Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the corner of Lauderdale Drive and Three Chopt Road. The development is less than 2 miles from the Route 288 interchange and 2.5 miles from the Short Pump I-64 exit.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Richmondâ€™s newest medical building supports the growing demand for provider services. By creating unparalleled patient access, the facility offers a â€œpark at your front doorâ€ type feel, allowing direct access to medical suites. Favorably located across from the main entrance to Short Pump Town Center, the subject site will provide up to 60,000 sq. ft. of medical/office space across two floors. Anchored by Rebkeeâ€™s newest 165-unit senior living apartments and The Corner at Short Pump Shopping Center, users will have convenient access to a variety of restaurants, shopping and entertainment.
